CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Account_Contact__c)== '',0,VALUE(TEXT(Account_Contact__c))) + IF(TEXT(Subject_Description__c)== '',0,VALUE(TEXT(Subject_Description__c))) + IF(TEXT(Picklist_Values__c)== '',0,VALUE(TEXT(Picklist_Values__c))) + IF(TEXT(Product__c)== '',0,VALUE(TEXT(Product__c))) + IF(TEXT(First_Contact_SLA__c)== '',0,VALUE(TEXT(First_Contact_SLA__c))) + IF(TEXT(Timely_Logging__c)== '',0,VALUE(TEXT(Timely_Logging__c))) + IF(TEXT(Case_Updates_Comments_Quality__c)== '',0,VALUE(TEXT(Case_Updates_Comments_Quality__c))) + IF(TEXT(Correct_Close_Reason__c)== '',0,VALUE(TEXT(Correct_Close_Reason__c))) + IF(TEXT(Timely_Resolution__c)== '',0,VALUE(TEXT(Timely_Resolution__c))) + IF(TEXT(Correct_Knowledge_Article_Attached__c)== 'N/A',10,IF(TEXT(Correct_Knowledge_Article_Attached__c)== '',0, VALUE(TEXT(Correct_Knowledge_Article_Attached__c)))) + IF(TEXT(Escalation_Process_followed_correctly__c)== 'N/A',10,IF(TEXT(Escalation_Process_followed_correctly__c)== '',0, VALUE(TEXT(Escalation_Process_followed_correctly__c))))
CustomField.label: Audit Total Score
